Name: Glassteroids
About the game: Glassteroids is a beautiful 3D arcade space blaster. Take classic 80s arcade gameplay, add an extra dimension, retro minimalist wireframe graphics and an epic soundtrack, and you will start to have an idea of what's ahead. The game starts in Pure mode with classic gameplay. Prove yourself by reaching level 10 in Pure and you will unlock Boosted mode. Here you can upgrade your ship with new weapons and abilities, as well as fight new enemies and boss battles.
